means.word_mean: 1. bottom-dweller of warm western Atlantic coastal waters having a flattened scaleless body that crawls about on fleshy pectoral and pelvic fins

auth_sentence.content: Rosy-lipped batfish never leave the sea and are perfectly good swimmers, but they also use their fins like pairs of legs.
